RECENT VINTAGE YEARS Including 1957

This vintage chart is presented in the belief that it is the most complete and most reliable guide to wine years that has yet been devised. The appraisals were not arrived at idly — they are the result of continuous tasting at the vineyards and much careful evaluation by Frank Schoonmaker, whose profound knowledge in the field of wine is recognized throughout Europe and America.
